articles.author: Mark Gurman
articles.title: Apple Reverses Move to Ban 'Fortnite' Maker From European Union - Bloomberg
articles.description: Apple Inc., facing mounting pressure from regulators in the European Union, has reversed a decision to ban Fortnite maker Epic Games Inc. from offering its own iPhone app marketplace in the region.
articles.content:

articles.title: Latest Israel-Hamas war news and Gaza conflict updates - The Washington Post
articles.description: The United States, Europe and United Arab Emirates have announced plans for a new maritime corridor to deliver much-needed humanitarian aid to Gaza by sea.

articles.author: Health Desk, Kristina Das
articles.title: 'Parrot Fever' outbreak in Europe kills 5 people: Know causes, symptoms and treatment of psittacosis - India TV News
articles.description: The recent deaths caused by 'parrot fever' in Europe serve as a stark reminder of the importance of being knowledgeable about diseases that can be passed from animals to humans.
